subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Melanie Oudin won to give the United States a 1-0 lead, but Russia’s Elena Dementieva evened up the semifinal matchup by beating Bethanie Mattek-Sands.
snippet: Melanie Oudin won to give the United States a 1-0 lead, but Russia’s Elena Dementieva evened up the semifinal matchup by beating Bethanie Mattek-Sands.
